trans-unit.resname: PZEN·9★ | Day of Judgment | Card Name
PZEN·9★ | Day of Judgment | Card Text
PZEN·9★ | Day of Judgment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I have seen planes leveled and all life rendered to dust. It brought no pleasure, even to a heart as dark as mine."\n—Sorin Markov
trans-unit.target: "I have seen planes leveled and all life rendered to dust. It brought no pleasure, even to a heart as dark as mine."\n—Sorin Markov

trans-unit.source: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.
trans-unit.target: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

trans-unit.source: "When the land is angry, so are they."\n—Nissa Revane
trans-unit.target: "When the land is angry, so are they."\n—Nissa Revane

trans-unit.resname: PZEN·228★ | Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle | Card Name
PZEN·228★ | Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle enters the battlefield tapped. Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle deal 3 damage to any target. {T}: Add {R}.
trans-unit.target: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle enters the battlefield tapped. Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle deal 3 damage to any target. {T}: Add {R}.
